Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had fond memories of cooking Thanksgiving

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I can poach a pretty mean egg the old-fashioned way

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: The spirit of pickling is one of adventure and fun

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no interest in vegetarians whatsoever. Zero. Less than zero

Quote.Author: Wylie Dufresne
Quote.QuoteValue: There will never be a universal way of cooking, but information will always be universally useful

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to fill your cup. You then give away the overflowing, but you keep a cupful for yourself

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Without love in you life, you have nothing

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is refreshment for the soul

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: I am most proud that I stayed true to the music of my soul

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: It took me 36 years to be able to be by myself and like it

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: I never took a music lesson in my life, it just came naturally

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: My music is about the journey, about love and the human experience

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are real in your music, people know it and they feel your authenticity

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Digital downloading of music has affected us all in adverse ways

Quote.Author: Wynonna Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: The love of these people and of my fans mean more than any award or special accomplishment

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: We always hear about the rights of democracy, but the major responsibility of it is participation

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: Ethics are more important than laws

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: We looked up to our father. He still is much greater than us

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: A musician's whole life is to listen

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't settle for style. Succeed in substance

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: Only a few act - the rest of us reap the benefits of their risk

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: It was Dr. King's tireless activism that fostered our modern way of relating to one another

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever you face a man who's playing your instrument, there's a competition

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: When people dress well, they play well

Quote.Author: Wynton Marsalis
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to make somebody feel like Coltrane made me feel, listening to it

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning the peace is harder than winning the war

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot undo the past in this misguided war in Iraq

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: The good news is that parents are the leading influence on kids' decision not to drink alcohol

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: Diabetes occurs at twice the rate in the African American community as it does in white Americans

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: As of 2002, two million Latino adults had been diagnosed with diabetes

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: I will fight like the dickens to protect Social Security

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: Having passion does not mean you have to descend into bickering and fighting

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: If something is personal to you, you are much more likely to act

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't win the game if you try to hit home runs all the time

Quote.Author: Xavier Becerra
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned to be pragmatic, but I don't sacrifice my principles, my values

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: In life, you need a house and a car. After that, you have a choice

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: I made a lot of money, and I want to give something back to my country

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: I once said, 'Steve Jobs is the American Xavier Niel,' but that was humour

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not unusual; it's the others who are strange

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny how the smallest things I've done speak the loudest about me, but I like that

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: I always follow the same idea: Start small and disrupt to create something big

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always investing. I'm constantly in talks with someone about some opportunity

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being an outsider. It is better in France on the outside

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to create an ecosystem which will make young people want to start their own company

Quote.Author: Xavier Niel
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Entrepreneur' is a French word

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: If knowledge and foresight are too penetrating and deep, unify them with ease and sincerity

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: I once tried thinking for an entire day, but I found it less valuable than one moment of study

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: The person attempting to travel two roads at once will get nowhere

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: Mencius said that human nature is good. I disagree with that

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: Human nature is evil, and goodness is caused by intentional activity

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: A person is born with a liking for profit

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: The coming of honor or disgrace must be a reflection of one's inner power

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: The rigid cause themselves to be broken; the pliable cause themselves to be bound

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: Those whose character is mean and vicious will rouse others to animosity against them

Quote.Author: Xun Kuang
Quote.QuoteValue: If the blood humor is too strong and robust, calm it with balance and harmony

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: All the jokes in my films, the comedy, they're not me, I just try to hold a big mirror up to us

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: In 1905 Albert discovered Relativity, in 1906 he invented Rock and Roll

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: While the eyes of the world will be on us let's show everyone that we have a great sense of humour

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what it means to be out there against the Olympics

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: So we have to be careful because if you don't protect your culture you won't have it for very long

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got so many stories to tell, you know, we could take on the world

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: I support all Australian films

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: Hollywood is horrible... it's beyond satire

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: It was always easy for me. I was born very rich and lucky

Quote.Author: Yahoo Serious
Quote.QuoteValue: Making your first feature film is actually impossible

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: My fate is in the hands of almighty Allah

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: Homosexuality is anti-humanity

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in killing people. I believe in locking you up for the rest of your life

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: I will develop the areas that vote for me, but if you don't vote for me, don't expect anything

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: Despite all odds we have emerged as one people and one country

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never seen homosexual chicken or turkey

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: Allowing homosexuality means allowing satanic rights

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: I can cure AIDS, and I will

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: Homosexuals are not welcome in the Gambia

Quote.Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote.QuoteValue: When your neighbour's house is on fire, you should help with a bucket of water

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not deal with threats and ultimatums

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: As opposed to journalists, politicians cannot make do with questions. They must also offer answers

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: The State of Israel was not established by anxiety but, rather, through pride

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: Facts cannot be replaced by opinion

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to do stuff, you have to be able to handle controversy

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics - when it's not cynical, it can be a creation

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: Israel can't be the only country in the Western world not to have freedom of religion

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeshivas barely teach any Bible, only Talmud

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: I studied math, and I was terrible at it

Quote.Author: Yair Lapid
Quote.QuoteValue: You want private education for your students? No problem whatsoever; pay for it

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Men and women are immigrants in each other's worlds

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is the shortest distance between two people

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe there is a direct correlation between love and laughter

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: If love is the treasure, laughter is the key

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody laughs the same in every language because laughter is a universal connection

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that laughter is a language of God and that we can all live happily ever laughter

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: When the needs of one person are being met by the other, there is laughter

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Never having alone time is real tough on people

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I like American women. They do things sexually Russian girls never dream of doing - like showering

Quote.Author: Yakov Smirnoff
Quote.QuoteValue: To my real estate agent, Chernobyl is a fixer-upper

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: My mantra is simple: work gets you work, and good work gets you good work

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: It's difficult when your family are not physically around you

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Sanam Re' is an amalgamation of an emotional love story and a visual treat

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: When I go out and I see the genuine appreciation from the people, that's a big thing for me

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't tag me as a regional actress

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a great opportunity when one gets something new to grasp, and I feel we should just grab it

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not just about achieving success; the journey is equally important for me

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: South India has beautiful villages

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: My career is a journey for me, and any journey is incomplete without the struggle

Quote.Author: Yami Gautam
Quote.QuoteValue: We all should face some failures in life and learn from them. We should accept it and move on

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sometimes women who are supposed to be strong are also written as mean and vindictive

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I pretty much make time for that weekly manicure

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: My junior high was dreadful. I see a lot of my fellow alumni on America's Most Wanted

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Yancy is actually a Native-American name, but I'm Irish. Go figure

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: My father used to sing to me in my mother's womb. I think I can name about any tune in two beats

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: To say I'm the easiest person to live with would be a lie

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: People just kind of associate me with kicking some ass

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: My taste in music and entertainment is quite eclectic

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just an actress. They try to give me as little information as possible

Quote.Author: Yancy Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I think seeing some of the past can be helpful, especially if you're into crime solving

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: Not only am I constantly seeking better performance but also to be a better person, to be respected

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to smile. I smile even when I'm nervous since it calms me down and shows my friendliness

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: I love various sports, including basketball, tennis and billiards

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to show the fans my big smile and play the game that I love

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn from your mistakes, and I think it's a good thing as long as you learn something

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a fearless but neutral personality

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: We always learn more from the losing than the winning

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still number one, so don't forget about that. So I still can have a happy ending

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope one day I will host my own charity event to give back to society

Quote.Author: Yani Tseng
Quote.QuoteValue: I am very happy since when I am in different cities I can experience and learn different cultures!

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm looking at a dead event and trying to give it new life. In a sense, I'm a taxidermist

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: I find that movies tend to fix the aesthetics of a story in people's minds

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinema is incredibly concise

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are much better at relating emotions and thoughts

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: The moral of a fable is eternal. The moral of a story is temporary to a story

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: If a film project were available and the timing was right, I might be interested

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Life of Pi' was actually a very simple novel to write

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy pretty well anywhere on this big, beautiful planet

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still learning my craft

Quote.Author: Yann Martel
Quote.QuoteValue: Any writer will be happy and good only if they know what they're doing and why they're doing it

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: You arrive at a village, and in this calm environment, one starts to hear echo

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: In the villages in Europe, there are still healers who tell stories

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: To take part in this brothel through the payment of my taxes, that had become to me unbearable

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: In black Africa, one does not strike, one does not express, one walks right

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: We have a saying in France. A dog doesn't make a cat

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: Your child is happy. What else could you want?

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: I always traveled. I left Cameroon when I was 11 years old. I lived in the USA, in Switzerland

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: Cracked was a very short warrior, whereas Marley was a pacifist warrior

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: Arthur Ashe had been the first black athlete to play Johannesburg at the time of apartheid

Quote.Author: Yannick Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: People judged my work without to have listened to it

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: Polka dots are fabulous

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to start a revolution, using art to build the sort of society I myself envisioned

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: Forget yourself. Become one with eternity. Become part of your environment

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: I, Kusama, am the modern Alice in Wonderland

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that eyes are very important motifs. That's something that can discern the peace and love

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to become more famous, even more famous

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in the U.S. about 15 years. Especially in New York. And then I came back to Japan

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a flood of ideas in my mind. I just follow my vision

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: I love painting so much that nothing else matters

Quote.Author: Yayoi Kusama
Quote.QuoteValue: The country of Britain is wonderful because of its royalty

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't sit under the tattoo gun unless I'm sold on it completely and it will define me as a person

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: I do so much music that it's like a fog, and I can't even remember all of it

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: My fans are like no other. Completely original people

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I have animosity, a chip on my shoulder. But I love, too

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I want to party, sometimes I want to fight and sometimes I want to cry

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: This is hip-hop. If you've got something you want to rap about, just rap about it, man

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Race is still real and you got to recognize it

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never in the mood to eat or drink when I get to a show. I'm just too nerved out

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Shady's great; I love Shady Records

Quote.Author: Yelawolf
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never scared what people are gonna think about music that I make

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Time has a way of demonstrating that the most stubborn are the most intelligent

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Envy is an insult to oneself

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: A poet's autobiography is his poetry. Anything else is just a footnote

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: I love sport because I love life, and sport is one of the basic joys of life

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: He who is conceived in a cage yearns for the cage

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Justice is like a train that is nearly always late

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry is like a bird, it ignores all frontiers

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: In Russia all tyrants believe poets to be their worst enemies

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Only when the sense of the pain of others begins does man begin

Quote.Author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Literature has to serve as a moral control of politics

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: Jerusalem is united, will never be divided again

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not celebrate the death of our enemies

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't make peace with friends. You make it with very unsavory enemies

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe however that peace is attainable regardless of the Arabs mentality, society or government

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: Israel has an important principle: It is only Israel that is responsible for our security

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: Give peace a chance

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: In the midst of fighting there is no place for public debate

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is no longer against us

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: It is our duty, to ourselves and to our children, to see the new world as it is now

Quote.Author: Yitzhak Rabin
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing harder than defining oneself

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - Good things happen when you meet strangers

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - There's a part of me that's always charging ahead. I'm the curious kid, always going to the edge

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - One of the things I love about music is live performance

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - I think that peace is, in many ways, a precondition of joy

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - My involvement in the political arena is to make sure there's a place for culture

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - I realized late in life that my twin passions are music and people

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - I think one of the great things about being a musician is that you never stop learning

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - People will ask, 'Are you famous?' And I always answer, 'My mother thinks so.'

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - I think anybody who goes away finds you appreciate home more when you return

Quote.Author: Y
Quote.QuoteValue: o Ma - We may be coming to a new golden age of instrument making

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: When you arrive at a fork in the road, take it

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: Little League baseball is a very good thing because it keeps the parents off the streets

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: Baseball is ninety percent mental and the other half is physical

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: You can observe a lot by watching

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the most important thing in the world, but baseball is pretty good, too

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: It ain't over till it's over

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I had an answer to that because I'm tired of answering that question

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: In theory there is no difference between theory and practice. In practice there is

Quote.Author: Yogi Berra
Quote.QuoteValue: It ain't the heat, it's the humility

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't born with a golden spoon in my mouth. It was a really tough life

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, I always try to make it to the final

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: Cricket is my first love

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: When my coach gives me a program, I damage it

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a beast. I just take it out on the track

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: When you guys are sleeping at night, I am out there working

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need to scare the other athletes. When I'm running, I will scare them

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: I love London, I love the British people

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: The track is fast and I appreciate anything is possible

Quote.Author: Yohan Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can come to the Olympic Games and leave with a medal then that is alright

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: The regret of my life is that I have not said 'I love you' often enough

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: Being alone is very difficult

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: Every moment in our lives is a miracle we should enjoy instead of ignoring

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: Every drop in the ocean counts

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: Healing yourself is connected with healing others

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't always be in awe of someone's talent, living with them

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought art was a verb, rather than a noun

Quote.Author: Yoko Ono
Quote.QuoteValue: When I turned 60, it didn't bother me at all

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Seasonality in winter doesn't have to mean sleep-inducing, stew-like, starchy casseroles

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Pasta with melted cheese is the one thing I could eat over and over again

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Food can bring people together in a way nothing else could

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing like a good old recipe. If it has lasted, then it is good

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: I do support people eating more vegetables. It's a good thing to do

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to entice people into cooking is to cook delicious things

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't taste an ingredient, you have to ask yourself why it is there

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Conflict is very much a state of mind. If you're not in that state of mind, it doesn't bother you

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: The Guardian's 'Word of Mouth' blog bridges the gap between blogging and serious food journalism

Quote.Author: Yotam Ottolenghi
Quote.QuoteValue: I have yet to meet a carnivore who doesn't love a sausage roll

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: I started rapping when I was about 12 or 13, just playing around with it

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: There's really no age limit when you out there in those streets

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody was in struggle, in the grind trying to make it

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: I was young and so eager to make some money as well as get exposed and show my talent

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: I want the world to get a feel of me, showing them the way I am and the way I get down

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: I been doing music my whole life

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Around the age of 14, 15, I was in the studio, serious about it

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: I felt like if I wasn't around, maybe my shot would be gone

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: It was like an honor thing for me to meet 50 cause I respected his whole story

Quote.Author: Young Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: With me being form the South, I wanted to make this album like a G Unit

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: My hustle is nonstop. I never stop hustling

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyday, all day I have to be productive. And when I ain't productive, I get concerned

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta have life your way. If you ain't losing your mind, you ain't partying right

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics isn't only about government. Politics is about the people

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got to pay $5 for gas just like everybody else
